channel.title: Playing 1.1_02
channel.description:
[url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=JASBQYVO]Click this link[/url] This is not mine, I'll be directly quoting how to use this from the person I got it from.
Now, how this works, is when you start Minecraft, it looks for the version file. I've included the version file from the new update, which means when Minecraft sees it, it looks like the game has updated, and doesn't bother to download and overwrite everything, while the game stays undated. After downloading - look for your .minecraft folder in Application Data. Unpack the bin.rar file that you download, into your bin folder, there. You're successfully downgraded. The server, using hey0's server wrapper, should have stayed downgraded, so that's not an issue, am I right? EDIT: Well, for everyone having issues, it's because I forgot that I have a few mods you have to accommodate for. =p I forgot I had them all, because they're useful mods that don't have an immediate effect on the game (like optimizers, and lighting mods.) For those of you who download this, follow the guide [url=http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewtopic.php?f=25&t=55700]Here[/url]. I use Better Light, and Better Grass (Don't worry about the mini-map, I don't like it. =p) You obviously don't have to follow the guide for putting files IN the jar, because that's already done. Sorry for the inconvenience, but at least you can play. =p
tl;dr - Bin folder has 1.1 files with a 1.2 version file so your files won't update and you can play 1.1 servers until 1.2 gets Bukkit plugins. You will also have to either follow the guide in his post to install a mod which gives better lighting/grass and a mini-map or follow the instructions to uninstall it.

When MITB reverts the map to 1.1_02 with hey0 mods you will need this because the 1.2_01 won’t be compatible.
